verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) Behold,<WH2009> how<WH4100> good<WH2896> and how<WH4100> pleasant<WH5273> it is For brothers<WH251> to dwell<WH3427> together<WH3162> in unity!<WH3162>

It is like the precious<WH2896> oil<WH8081> upon the head,<WH7218> Coming<WH3381> down<WH3381> upon the beard,<WH2206> [Even] Aaron's beard,<WH2206> Coming<WH3381> down<WH3381> upon the edge<WH6310> of his robes.<WH4060>

It is like the dew<WH2919> of Hermon,<WH2768> Coming<WH3381> down<WH3381> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Zion;<WH6726> For there<WH8033> the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> the blessing<WH1293> â€“ life<WH9132> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
